item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Son of Sam: The Killer Speaks
item.description: Nearly five decades ago, the "Son of Sam" terrorized New York City. In a 2017 prison interview, convicted serial killer David Berkowitz tells CBS News...

item.title: Earthquake in Bergen County shakes parts of New Jersey, New York
item.description: An earthquake in Hasbrouck Heights, Bergen County, shook parts of New Jersey and New York on Saturday night.

item.title: The Yogurt Shop Murders
